ygData.subject: Level 4 and 8 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Right now, I am a level 5 Necromancer. I have bought Cavorting Bones(I think that is the name of the level 4 pet spell), Clinging Darkness, and Lifespike. Are
ygData.messageBody:
Right now, I am a level 5 Necromancer. I have bought Cavorting Bones(I think that is the name of the level 4 pet spell), Clinging Darkness, and Lifespike. Are tehre any other spells I should buy at this level. I am not going to buy Gate until level 8, because I will not be travelling far until level 8(when I get Gather Shadows). At level 8, what spells should I buy? Right now, I am thinking Gather Shadows -> Pet -> Gate -> Ward Undead. Are there any other spells I should buy at this level? And should I change this order?



Leanne, level 5 Gnomish Necromancer
